content: We have a new stream: #triage ! Once a day around 2pm UTC, a friendly bot will randomly choose an old PR and an old issue from mathlib and post them in that stream. The idea is to bring a bit of attention to work that might fall down the queue and off people's radars.
Please follow the stream and discuss as the bot prompts you to!
A reminder, if you didn't see this before. Random Issue Bot is steadily posting things to #triage for discussion, come join the fun.
